dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5935 IH: Small practice, Underserved, and Rural Support program Extension Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Stansbury (for herself and Mr. Burgess) introduced the following bill

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend the Quality Payment Program-Small Practice, Underserved, and Rural Support program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small practice, Underserved, and Rural Support program Extension Act of 2023 or the SURS Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of Quality Payment Program-Small Practice, Underserved, and Rural Support program
section.text: The first sentence of section 1848(q)(11)(B) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395wâ€“4(q)(11)(B)) is amended by inserting and for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2029 before the period.
